metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website

content.text: Job Replacement
What Jobs Will be Taken Over by Computers?
In 2013 , the Oxford scientists Carl Benedikt Frey and Michael A. Osborne, published a probability that 47% of all professions will be taken over by computers in Two Decades .
content.html: In 2013, the Oxford scientists Carl Benedikt Frey and Michael A. Osborne, published a probability that 47% of all professions will be taken over by computers in Two Decades.

content.text: Source: Oxford - The_Future_of_Employment.pdf
content.html: Source: Oxford - The_Future_of_Employment.pdf

content.text: The table below is from the list. It ranks occupations according to their probability of computerization.
content.html: The table below is from the list. It ranks occupations according to their probability of computerization.

content.text: Bookkeeping
99% of all Tax Preparers 99% of all Account Clerks 98% of all Bookkeeping Clerks 98% of all Credit Analysts
content.html:
99% of all Tax Preparers
99% of all Account Clerks
98% of all Bookkeeping Clerks
98% of all Credit Analysts

content.text: Carl Benedikt Frey and Michael A. Osborne were right.
content.html: Carl Benedikt Frey and Michael A. Osborne were right.

content.text: Today, bookkeeping is automated.
content.html: Today, bookkeeping is automated.

content.text: For these jobs, computers are much more affordable than people.
content.html: For these jobs, computers are much more affordable than people.

content.text: Sales And Customers

99% of all Telemarketers 97% of all Cashiers 94% of all Door-to-Door Salesmen 92% of all Insurance Sales Agents 85% of all Sales Representatives 58% of all Financial Advisors 55% of all Customer Service 54% of all Sales Agents
content.html:
99% of all Telemarketers
97% of all Cashiers
94% of all Door-to-Door Salesmen
92% of all Insurance Sales Agents
85% of all Sales Representatives
58% of all Financial Advisors
55% of all Customer Service
54% of all Sales Agents

content.text: They were right.
content.html: They were right.

content.text: Web shopping is taking over.
content.html: Web shopping is taking over.

content.text: Conversion rates for telephone sales are not very attractive.
content.html: Conversion rates for telephone sales are not very attractive.

content.text: Production Workers
98% of all Packaging Machine Operators 95% of all Print Binding and Finishing Workers 93% of all Industrial Truck Operators 92% of all Production Workers 87% of all Food Preparation Workers
content.html:
98% of all Packaging Machine Operators
95% of all Print Binding and Finishing Workers
93% of all Industrial Truck Operators
92% of all Production Workers
87% of all Food Preparation Workers

content.text: Assembly line robots has been around for 50 years.
content.html: Assembly line robots has been around for 50 years.

content.text: Today, smart robots can be programmed by anyone to do anything.
content.html: Today, smart robots can be programmed by anyone to do anything.

content.text: Robots are replacing jobs at Amazon:
content.html: Robots are replacing jobs at Amazon:

99% of all Data Entry Keyers 84% of all Proofreaders 65% of all Librarians 54% of all Film and Video Editors
content.html:

84% of all Proofreaders

content.text: Proofreading software is everywhere. From spell check to the Hemingway App .
content.html: Proofreading software is everywhere. From spell check to the Hemingway App.

81% of all Fast Food Cooks 77% of all Bartenders 77% of all Dishwashers
content.html:
81% of all Fast Food Cooks
77% of all Bartenders
77% of all Dishwashers

content.text: Coffee robots can replace many baristas.
content.html: Coffee robots can replace many baristas.

content.text: 5 Best Robot Coffee Baristas 2020
content.html: 5 Best Robot Coffee Baristas 2020

95% of all Postal Service Clerks 79% of all Mail Sorters 75% of all Postmasters 68% of all Mail Carriers

content.text: Airplane Pilots
55% of all Pilots
content.html: 55% of all Pilots

content.text: The military uses drones today.
content.html: The military uses drones today.

content.text: Tomorrow AI will replace the pilots of cargo planes.
content.html: Tomorrow AI will replace the pilots of cargo planes.

content.text: Passenger planes will have only one pilot. The second pilot will be an autopilot.
content.html: Passenger planes will have only one pilot. The second pilot will be an autopilot.

content.text: Drivers. Transportation Jobs
69% of all Taxi Drivers 69% of all Truck Drivers 67% of all Bus Drivers
content.html:
69% of all Taxi Drivers
69% of all Truck Drivers
67% of all Bus Drivers

content.text: Self-driving cars is already a reality.
content.html: Self-driving cars is already a reality.

content.text: The potential of jobs lost is staggering.
content.html: The potential of jobs lost is staggering.

content.text: Very soon AI could replace millions of transportation jobs.
content.html: Very soon AI could replace millions of transportation jobs.

content.text: Robots could take 20 million jobs by 2030
According to a study from Oxford Economics (2019), there could be 14 million robots working in China by 2030.
content.html: According to a study from Oxford Economics (2019), there could be 14 million robots working in China by 2030.
